text: Diego Natale Bona (11 December 1926 - 29 April 2017) was a Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1950, Bona served as bishop of the Diocese of Porto-Santa Rufina, Italy from 1985 to 1994. He then served as bishop of the Diocese of Saluzzo from 1994 to 2003.Diocese of Saluzzo ==Notes== Category:1926 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Diego Natale Bona
